title: U.S. disposable personal income - monthly percentage of change 2019/20
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Monthly percentage of change in the y axis.
Month Jan '20 has the highest Monthly percentage of change and Oct '19 has the lowest Monthly percentage of change.
The difference of Monthly percentage of change between the highest and lowest Month is 0.6.
